appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Stay private with you favorite sites safely with maximum security. Ublock sites and services, blocked in your country, like VK, Youtube, Linkedin or adult.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

errorNoExtensionAccess.message: Sorry. This browser's proxy settings cannot be controlled via extensions.

errorOtherExtensionControls.message: Sorry. This browser's proxy settings are being controlled by another extension. Please visit chrome://extensions for details.

errorSettingRegularProxy.message: Setting regular proxy settings failed.  Sorry!
errorSettingRegularProxy.description: Error message, displayed when failing to set regular proxy settings.

errorSettingIncognitoProxy.message: Setting incognito proxy settings failed.  Sorry!
errorSettingIncognitoProxy.description: Error message, displayed when failing to set incognito proxy settings.

errorPopupTitle.description: Error message used as popup title.

errorProxyError.description: Error message displayed in popup when an error occurs.

errorProxyDetailedError.description: Error message displayed in popup when an error occurs.
